name: Austin Wilcox
text: Do not eat here!!! It's not worth the money. They use to have better quality but in the few recent times I've ordered the pizza has been very subpar.

Tried the new pretzel crust pizza and it was absolutely delicious. Friendly service.

name: Aaron Taube
text: I was a little worried since the previous franchise here always was off and turned out to have massive health code problems this would be the same. They have blown me away every time. If you want that good cheap pizza, then you are getting exactly what you came for here.

name: Danna Dean
text: I am thrilled to say that the owner of the Subway/Little Caesar building on Russell Pkwy had the cement barriers moved in the parking lot to line up with the proper spaces. Thank you, Mr. Ramanlal, for seeing to this. I no longer feel it is a dangerous situation like it was when I fell back in August. Thank you many times over!

text: I went in and ordered 3 pizzas. The female employee said 15 minutes. 25 minutes later I was still waiting for those pizzas. Meanwhile 10 people that came in after me got their pizzas and left. When I asked the female employee about my â€¦More

text: Staff is always friendly no matter what time you walk in. The pizza is always exactly how you ordered it and always hot. They have no problem cooking you a fresh one. The longest I've ever waited was 15 mins for a specialty pizza and cheese bread sticks.
